title: Large-Scale Hybrid Platform Strategies for Facilitating Cross-Cultural Online Discussions

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in using digital devices and experience with online communication
context.additional_context: Language education program for working professionals combining offline classes with online collaborative learning. Designed to enhance intercultural communication skills based on work experience

learning_goals: Learners can explain strategies for accepting and respecting diverse perspectives in cross-cultural online discussions.
Learners can distinguish and perform formal discussion topics and informal social interactions using blended platforms (Moodle and supplementary platforms).
Learners can improve discussion content by incorporating feedback and apply communication techniques considering cultural differences.

resources: Guide for Using Alternative Social Platforms (e.g., Facebook Substitutes)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
